sundaes.name: Strawberry Sundae
sundaes.description: Strawberry & vanilla ice cream with layers of fresh strawberries and strawberry sauce, topped with cream and more fresh strawberries

sundaes.name: Chocoholic Sundae
sundaes.description: Chocolate and vanilla ice cream with layers of chocolate sauce, chocolate sprinkles & chocolate buttons, topped with cream & more chocolate sprinkles

sundaes.name: Babelicious Sundae
sundaes.description: Bubble-gum & vanilla ice cream with layers of bubble-gum sauce, bubble-gum millions, topped with cream & more bubble-gum millions

sundaes.name: Tuckshop Sundae
sundaes.description: Vanilla & millions ice cream with bubble-gum & candy floss chocolate sauce layered with rainbow sprinkles & mini marshmallows, topped with cream and more sprinkles

sundaes.name: Black Cherry Sundae
sundaes.description: Chocolate, raspberry ripple & vanilla ice cream layered with black cherry sauce and brownies, topped with cream and sauce

sundaes.name: Tutti Fruity Sundae
sundaes.description: Vanilla, mango & strawberry ice cream layered with fresh strawberries, fresh berries & drizzled with strawberry and raspberry sauce, topped with cream and more fresh berries

sundaes.name: Fruit Sorbet Sundae
sundaes.description: A mix of luxury fruit sorbets layered between fresh fruits and berries and drizzled with raspberry and strawberry sauce

sundaes.name: Biscoff Sundae
sundaes.description: Vanilla & Biscoff ice cream layered with crushed Biscoff biscuits & Biscoff sauce, topped with cream & more Biscoff biscuits
